id.description: The unique identifier of the order

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer who placed the order

delivery_tax.description: The tax applied to delivery charges

entered_by_type.description: The type of user who entered the order

shipping_selections.description: The selected shipping options for the order

items.description: Details of the items selected for shipping

sales_agent_user_id.description: The ID of the sales agent associated with the order

customer_type_id.description: The ID representing the type of customer

adcode.description: The adcode associated with the order

ordered_at.description: The timestamp when the order was placed

order_status_id.description: The ID representing the current status of the order

special_instructions.description: Any special instructions provided for handling the order

subtotal.description: The subtotal amount before any taxes or discounts applied

tax_total.description: The total amount of tax applied to the order

shipping_total.description: The total shipping charges for the order

discount_total.description: The total discount applied to the order

grand_total.description: The total amount payable including all charges

cost_total.description: The total cost of the order

selected_shipping_method.description: The chosen shipping method for delivery

ip_address.description: The IP address from which the order was placed

exported_to_accounting_system.description: Flag indicating if the order has been exported to the accounting system

referrer.description: The source or reference from where the order originated

order_shipping_address_id.description: The ID of the shipping address linked to the order

order_billing_address_id.description: The ID of the billing address associated with the order

admin_comments.description: Comments added by the admin for the order

source.description: The original source from where the order was generated

search_phrase.description: The search phrase used before placing the order

is_ppc.description: Indicates if the order is related to pay-per-click advertising

ppc_keyword.description: The keyword related to the pay-per-click campaign

affiliate_id.description: The affiliate ID associated with the order

store_id.description: The ID of the store from where the order was placed

session_id.description: The unique identifier of the session linked to the order

handling_total.description: The total handling charges applied to the order

is_payment_order_only.description: Indicates if the order includes only payment items

selected_shipping_provider_service.description: The service provided by the selected shipping provider

additional_fees.description: Any additional fees applied to the order

adcode_id.description: The adcode ID associated with the order

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the order was last updated

created_at.description: The timestamp when the order was created

is_gift.description: Indicates if the order is a gift order

gift_message.description: Any gift message associated with the order

public_comments.description: Comments visible to the public for the order

instructions.description: Any special instructions provided for the order

source_group.description: The group/category of the source from where the order originated

from_subscription_id.description: The ID of the subscription linked to the order

previous_order_status_id.description: The ID representing the previous status of the order

order_status_last_changed_at.description: The timestamp when the order status was last changed

discounted_shipping_total.description: The shipping total after discounts are applied

coupon_code.description: The coupon code used for discounts on the order

expires_at.description: The timestamp when the order expires

expires.description: Indicates if the order has expired

from_quote_id.description: The ID of the quote from which the order was created

campaign_code.description: The campaign code linked to the order

reward_points_credited.description: The reward points credited for the order

channel.description: The channel through which the order was made

device.description: The device used to place the order

manufacturer_invoice_number.description: The invoice number provided by the manufacturer

manufacturer_invoice_amount.description: The amount mentioned in the manufacturer's invoice

manufacturer_invoice_paid.description: Indicates if the manufacturer's invoice has been paid

entered_by.description: The user who entered the order

due_date.description: The date by which the payment is due
